abstract: The growth was a “barely palpable” 0.4 percent, Kantar Media reported. While midsize advertisers increased their spending, the largest companies decided to become very conservative in their spending.
snippet: The growth was a “barely palpable” 0.4 percent, Kantar Media reported. While midsize advertisers increased their spending, the largest companies decided to become very conservative in their spending.
lead_paragraph: Like traffic on the way to the beach on a summer Friday afternoon, advertising spending in the third quarter barely moved, according to a report to be released on Monday morning.

headline.main: Ad Spending Slowed to a Crawl in the 3rd Quarter, Report Finds
